item.title: Picocrypt/Picocrypt
item.description: A very small, very simple, yet very secure encryption tool.

item.title: peazip/PeaZip
item.description: Free Zip / Unzip software and Rar file extractor. Cross-platform file and archive manager. Features volume spanning, compression, authenticated encryption. Supports 7Z, 7-Zip sfx, ACE, ARJ, Brotli, BZ2, CAB, CHM, CPIO, DEB, GZ, ISO, JAR, LHA/LZH, NSIS, OOo, PAQ/LPAQ, PEA, QUAD, RAR, RPM, split, TAR, Z, ZIP, ZIPX, Zstandard.

item.title: rclone/rclone
item.description: “rsync for cloud storage” - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

item.title: duplicati/duplicati
item.description: Store securely encrypted backups in the cloud!

item.title: HotCakeX/Harden-Windows-Security
item.description: Harden Windows Safely, Securely using Official Supported Microsoft methods and proper explanation | Always up-to-date and works with the latest build of Windows | Provides tools and Guides for Personal, Enterprise, Government and Military security levels | Read The Rationale https://github.com/HotCakeX/Harden-Windows-Security/blob/main/Rationale.md

item.description: SimpleX - the first messaging network operating without user identifiers of any kind - 100% private by design! iOS, Android and desktop apps ðŸ“±!

item.description: A free, secure and open source app for Android to manage your 2-step verification tokens.

item.title: kopia/kopia
item.description: Cross-platform backup tool for Windows, macOS & Linux with fast, incremental backups, client-side end-to-end encryption, compression and data deduplication. CLI and GUI included.

item.title: psanford/wormhole-william
item.description: End-to-end encrypted file transfer. A magic wormhole CLI and API in Go (golang).

item.description: Spacedrive is an open source cross-platform file explorer, powered by a virtual distributed filesystem written in Rust.

item.description: Safe Notes is a security project aimed at providing an encrypted, private note manager that works locally and protects notes from various threat actors.
